short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides quick insights into seller locations and summarized product reviews on Amazon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing our Amazon and ebay Seller Info and Review Summary extension! This handy tool provides a comprehensive overview of sellers on Amazon, giving users quick access to essential details about the seller's background, reputation, and performance. With a glance, users can view seller ratings, feedback history, and review summaries, empowering them to make informed purchasing decisions. Say goodbye to uncertainty and hello to confidence with our Amazon Seller Info and Review Summary extension.
